name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET) with 13+ years of experience in developing and testing high-performance applications. Proficient in **Python**, with hands-on experience in **Pytest** for writing robust tests, as well as managing CI/CD workflows using **GitLab CI** and **Jenkins**. Adept at utilizing data manipulation libraries such as **Pandas** and **NumPy** for validating application logic. Familiar with cloud services including **AWS** (notably **Glue**, **Lambdas**, **S3**) and adept at working with message brokers like **RabbitMQ** and **Kafka**. Experienced in monitoring and logging systems through **ELK** stack and **Prometheus**, and implementing continuous deployments using **ArgoCD** and **k8s**.
Strong background in Full Stack development with expertise in both frontend frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue**, and backend frameworks like **FastAPI** and **Django**. Completed various projects in compliance-driven environments, ensuring adherence to standards like HIPAA and SOC 2. Demonstrated success in building AI/ML applications and orchestrating models with **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
